title: 问下,权限插件怎么取消某个权限的使用
author: 陈益璐
txt_content: 比如不想让玩家用spawn 但设置里面没有这个 怎么禁止玩家使用 一定要一个一个加麽

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
陈益璐 发表于 2012-9-22 23:00 
呃呃 输入后出现 
Counldn't retrieve your world.Default world'world'selected.
The group doesn't ...
The group doesn't have direct access to that permission.说明本来就没有spawn权限。没有取消的必要了。


至于单点warp。找到"服务器目录\plugins\Essentials\config.yml"高级文本编辑器打开，找到per-warp-permission: false复制代码改为per-warp-permission: true复制代码这样以后玩家就不能随便warp地点了，需要拥有essentials.warp.[warp地点名称]  这个权限才能warp相应地点

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
取消玩家的essentials.spawn权限即可。

manudelp 单个玩家名 essentials.spawn

mangdelp 玩家组名 essentials.spawn

replies.author: 陈益璐
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 陈益璐 于 2012-9-22 23:02 编辑 
strawmaine 发表于 2012-9-21 22:36 
取消玩家的essentials.spawn权限即可。

manudelp 单个玩家名 essentials.spawn

呃呃 输入后出现 
Counldn't retrieve your world.Default world'world'selected.
The group doesn't have direct access to that permission.
/mangdelp <group> <permissions>

还有 可不可以不让玩家warp 某个地方 比如 warp 1可以 warp 2不行
